title: sArasa mrdupada (pv)
sahitya:
sArasa mrdupAda sAdaram mAmava sarasijanAbha kOmala


anupallavi

  pArijAta dAna bhAla shObhi tilaka cAru vacasa sAtara sAnandaya ramaNa
			(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
sAgara sama kari paranagamAmara pAlana rucipada cAru vishadarada nIpamarudapi 
madayati matima parasukha kalaya mudamiha nirupama paradhritikara


caraNam 1    nIraja bANOpama
			(svara sAhitams)
1. tApahara vacasa vijitasudha
2. sAra sumasha rasAyaka gata rasAmahaha tarasA vilOkaya
3. pATita bahu viraha nikara hrdamala pArvaNa vidhurapi  kirati kiraNamiha 
pAvaka samamayi nisimayi vipula krpAdharita kanaka vasana bharItarasa 
 caraNam 4    sAra madhu nilayamayi bhavada dharamiha vitara mama girivaradhara sAdhu savidham apApa kalaya sAhasa sama dhikam udAramaya kamanIya carita rajanIsha mukha jagadanIhanuta kaluSa niradha pavana
nIraja su-nayana nIta sakala sukha nItinilaya shayanIya madhinivAsa
 caraNam 2    nIraja bANOpama nikhila bhuvana vara kAraNam tvAm vinA kAmOda rIti radya
